page.title: 01Index, Gazetteer.
page.content: This area includes the districts known as{High Lane,Hazel Grove}and{Poynton. Part of{Hazel Grove}is refered to as {Norbury}and another part as{Torkington {Hazel Grove}was called Bullocks Smithy up to 1836. The area is on the edge of Greater Manchester and is partly residential and partly countryside with very little industry and a few small farms. There are good transport links by rail and road,{the A6 and the A523 {dominate the area. The area was once mainly mining and mills but now the majority of the population commute to their work in nearby towns.The housing is a mixture of council and private housing. The following pages relate to interesting buildings,present day life transport and recreation. {This a very pleasant area to live in
